Collector Gutenhagen: Like animals, machines need to evolve. Evolve or become antiquities. The Horrifying Golem Army has gained considerable strength by adhering to this motto. And they are up to something lately. I was trying to find out what, but I have had zero success. The research and data collection is.. complicated...
